name: Trials of Hermes
description:
Trials of Hermes was the first "game" I ever made for school. Now I want to revamp it and make it something more.

Trials of Hermes is a basic 2D platformer with some aspects of an action/adventure game. The goal is to traverse the levels to find a gem that activates a portal. You'll have to explore each level to find the gem, all while avoiding - or defeating - your enemies. You only have so much mana though, so you'll have to be strategic!

Check out some of my other work on my portfolio!
